[ti:Without You ((Boy Dunno Remix)(Explicit))]
[ar:The Kid LAROI]
[al:Without You (Explicit)]

[00:00.00]Without You (Boy Dunno Remix|Explicit) - The Kid LAROI
[00:06.59]Lyrics by：Charlton Howard/Boy Dunno
[00:13.18]Composed by：Charlton Howard/Boy Dunno
[00:19.77]I can't believe that you would up and leave me
[00:24.12]F**k all of your reasons
[00:26.60]I lost my s**t you know I didn't mean it
[00:30.01]Now I see it you run and repeat it
[00:34.26]And I can't take it back
[00:36.22]So in the past is where we'll leave it
[00:39.97]So there you go oh
[00:42.19]Can't make a wife out of a ho oh
[00:44.63]I'll never find the words to say I'm sorry
[00:48.01]But I'm scared to be alone
[00:50.53]You cut out a piece of me and now I bleed internally
[00:55.34]Left here without you
[00:57.34]No no no
[00:58.51]Without you
[00:59.76]Ooh-ooh ooh
[01:00.81]And it hurts for me to think about
[01:03.58]What life could possibly be like
[01:06.13]Without you
[01:07.58]No no no
[01:08.71]Without you
[01:09.89]No no
[01:21.46]Oh-oh woah oh-oh woah-oh
[01:24.35]Oh woah oh-oh woah-oh
[01:26.85]Oh-oh woah oh-oh woah-oh
[01:29.40]Oh woah oh-oh woah-oh
[01:31.97]It's gon' be hard here on my own
[01:34.28]And even harder to let you go I
[01:37.14]Really wish that we could have got this right
[01:41.20]So here I go oh
[01:43.38]Can't make a wife out of a ho oh
[01:45.81]I'll never find the words to say I'm sorry
[01:49.25]But I'm scared to be alone
[01:51.72]You cut out a piece of me and now I bleed internally
[01:56.48]Left here without you
[01:58.52]No no no
[01:59.71]Without you
[02:01.11]Ooh-ooh ooh
[02:02.07]And it hurts for me to think about
[02:04.80]What life could possibly be like
[02:07.38]Without you
[02:08.68]No no no
[02:10.05]Without you
[02:11.28]No no
[02:22.73]Oh-oh woah oh-oh woah-oh
[02:25.58]Oh woah oh-oh woah
[02:28.01]Oh-oh woah oh-oh woah-oh
[02:30.69]Oh woah oh-oh woah
[02:32.33]So here you go oh
[02:34.37]Can't make a wife out of a ho oh
[02:36.91]I'll never find the words to say I'm sorry
[02:40.33]But I'm scared to be alone
data.trans:
[ti:Without You ((Boy Dunno Remix)(Explicit))]
[ar:The Kid LAROI]
[al:Without You (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:06.59]//
[00:13.18]//
[00:19.77]我不敢相信你竟会离我而去
[00:24.12]我不愿听你的措辞
[00:26.60]我只是一时迷失 我并不是故意伤害你
[00:30.01]如今看着你逃离我 重蹈覆辙
[00:34.26]我也难以收回说出的话
[00:36.22]所以我们将之留在过去
[00:39.97]你已离去
[00:42.19]不能让你成为我的妻子
[00:44.63]难以对你道歉
[00:48.01]但我害怕孤身一人
[00:50.53]你让我心痛不已 如今我的心在淌血
[00:55.34]你把我扔在这里 我已没有你的陪伴
[00:57.34]//
[00:58.51]没有你在身旁
[00:59.76]//
[01:00.81]当我想到你不会伴我身旁 我就心如刀割
[01:03.58]我难以想象没有你的生活
[01:06.13]没有你在身旁
[01:07.58]//
[01:08.71]没有你在身旁
[01:09.89]//
[01:21.46]//
[01:24.35]//
[01:26.85]//
[01:29.40]//
[01:31.97]自己一个人的生活 将会无比艰难
[01:34.28]目睹着你离去 更是难上加难
[01:37.14]我真希望 我们可以破镜重圆
[01:41.20]所以我说
[01:43.38]不能让你成为我的妻子
[01:45.81]难以对你道歉
[01:49.25]但我害怕孤身一人
[01:51.72]你让我心痛不已 如今我的心在淌血
[01:56.48]你把我扔在这里 我已没有你的陪伴
[01:58.52]//
[01:59.71]没有你在身旁
[02:01.11]//
[02:02.07]当我想到你不会伴我身旁 我就心如刀割
[02:04.80]我难以想象没有你的生活
[02:07.38]没有你在身旁

[02:10.05]没有你在身旁
